dn10:1.1.2: Ānanda’s role became more prominent as a leader of the Saṅgha in the years after the Buddha’s passing.
dn10:1.1.3: The same Subha met the Buddha in [mn99](), which was before Pokkharasāti’s conversion, and again in [mn135](), where he asked about kamma. His father was a prominent brahmin, often mentioned alongside Pokkharasāti.
dn10:2.37.9: He had already gone to the Buddha for refuge in [mn99:28.4]() and [mn135:21.4]().
